fields.name: Description
fields.value: Computes an approximation of the sine of the source operand in register ST(0) and stores the result in ST(0). The source operand must be given in radians and must be within the range −263 to +263. The following table shows the results obtained when taking the sine of various classes of numbers, assuming that underflow does not occur.

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
